com.tmathmeyer.jadis

Class Jadis

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tmathmeyer.jadis.Jadis

  • public class Jadis
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    tmathmeyer Asynchronous Redis Client!! for now, it only supports the basic lists and maps of redis

    • Method Detail

      • getJadis

        public static Jadis getJadis(java.lang.String name)
        gets the singleton instance of jadis, to make sure that there are no open conflicting connections to the database
        Parameters:
        name - the server name for jadis... pass null or 'localhost' for local
        Returns:
        the the static instance of jadis

      • getMap

        public <T> void getMap(java.lang.String mapName,
              Promise<T> executor,
              java.lang.Class<T> clazz,
              CallBackLogger<java.lang.Exception> cbl)
        Get's all the elements in the specified map, equivalent to hgetall in the redis-cli
        Parameters:
        mapName - the name of the map to get from redis
        executor - the Promise that gets it's getMap() function called when this finished executing
        clazz - the type of element that is being parsed
        cbl - the logger for exceptions to bring them out of the API

        Parameters:
        mapName - the name of the map in redis
        elementKey - the name of the element in the named map
        executor - the Promise to be called into when the query finishes
        clazz -
        cbl -

        public <T> void putMap(java.lang.String mapName,
              java.lang.String elemKey,
              T insert,
              CallBackLogger<java.lang.Exception> cbl)
        Parameters:
        mapName - the name of the map
        elemKey - the name of the key corresponding to the value
        insert - the value itself
        cbl - the callback logger to elevate the exception out of the API

        Parameters:
        mapName - the map name to delete from
        cbl - the error handler to elevate the errors
        objNames - the names of all the keys to remove from the DB
